name: Galleries First British Airways Lounge, Heathrow Terminal 3
description:
A quick video focusing on British Airways' Galleries First lounge at Heathrow T3. 

Entry is for first class passengers, and OneWorld Emerald tier members only. Top tip - you can order off the menu if you like!

There is a Galleries Club next door, too - for business class and OneWorld Sapphires. 

The next flight trip report is due in just a few days' time! Thanks for subscribing, and enjoy the video.

You can also follow me on:

Twitter: @pauls_trips

SnapChat: pauls_trips
